meanings.sent1: The pilfering of candies from the jar was noticed by the teacher.
meanings.sent2: He was caught pilfering pens from his classmates' desks.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's pilfering of nuts from the bird feeder provided entertainment for the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her pilfering of time during work hours eventually caught up with her.
meanings.sent5: The pilfering of coins from the fountain brought bad luck to the town.

meanings.definition: To steal things of little value.
meanings.sent1: She was pilfering apples from the neighbor's tree.
meanings.sent2: The thief was known for pilfering items from unlocked cars.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon was pilfering snacks from the campers' bags all night.
meanings.sent4: He felt like someone was pilfering his thoughts during the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous cat was pilfering socks from the laundry basket.
